amendment.description: To redesignate the Assistant Secretary of the Air Force for Acquisition as the Assistant Secretary of the Air Force for Acquisition, Technology, and Logistics.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4071 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4071 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Hatch.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4071 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4071 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Hatch.
